entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a 16-year-old boy who is on a mission to reach a certain place.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is guiding Harry on his journey.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who is trying to prevent Harry from reaching his goal.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is guiding Harry on his journey and providing him with advice and support.
Voldemort is trying to prevent Harry from reaching his goal, creating an obstacle for him.
